channel.title: Fixing Doors and Stairs
channel.description: Ok I want to make the champions guild near varrock, like a home type thing, theres 3 doors, and a pair of stairs and a trapdoor, I want all the doors to open correctly, stairs tping u up and down, and trapdoor tping u to that place where your suppose to go in real rs. How do I fix all this? it would be a nice if someone can post a tutorial, and im using ddspec.

item.title: Fixing Doors and Stairs
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

The stairs and trapdoor won’t load unless you are disconnected and reconnect though, will they? because on silabs client if you want to keep the same x and y, then the new height level won’t load properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Doors and Stairs
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Doors - ReplaceObject(x, y, id, face);
Stairs & Trapdoor - teleportToX = x; teleportToY = y; heightLevel = h;

Read full topic
